definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The penalty was a result of a poor poor tackle by Hutchinson.
sentences.chinese: 哈奇森糟糕到不行的铲球制造了这个点球。

sentences.english: In preparation for your Actua Cup campaign you can practice in friendlies and penalty shootout competitions.
sentences.chinese: 为冠军杯做准备，先在友谊赛和罚点球竞赛中练习。

sentences.english: I just hope I didn't hurt anyone to the right side of the goal with my second shot!
sentences.chinese: 我希望没有第二个打飞的点球没有伤到球迷。

sentences.english: They've built a wall of players for a penalty shot.
sentences.chinese: 他们筑起一堵人墙准备对付罚点球射门。

sentences.english: Remained calm when Reina saved his spot-kick.
sentences.chinese: 在雷纳扑出点球时保持了镇定。

sentences.english: Closed Area defensive side foul, offensive side or indirect punishment completely arbitrary ball.
sentences.chinese: 禁区内防守方犯规，进攻方罚点球或间接任意球。

sentences.english: Dutchmen and the penalty kick. It has seemed to be an unlucky friendship for over a long time.
sentences.chinese: 荷兰人和点球，很长时间被看作一对不幸的朋友。

sentences.english: Shorrock took the penalty kick making the ball swerve into the top right-hand corner of the net.
sentences.chinese: 罚点球时，肖罗克一个弧线球将球踢进右上角。

sentences.english: Tripping results in a 10-yard penalty against the offending team.
sentences.chinese: 绊人犯规犯规队被判罚10码开外的点球。

sentences.english: The referee is whistling for a penalty.
But anyone can lose in a penalty kick shoot-out, that's a fact.
sentences.chinese: 但任何人都可能错过点球，这是事实。

sentences.english: The winning spot kick in the 2005 FA Cup Final shoot-out against Manchester United.
sentences.chinese: 2005年足总杯决赛点球宣判了曼联的死刑。

sentences.english: You know, John Terry slips in the penalty shoot-out last year and Manchester United win the final.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，特里去年罚点球时摔倒让曼联捧杯。

sentences.english: Not even the gift of an injury-time penalty was enough to help Chelsea turn their fortunes around.
sentences.chinese: 即使有补时阶段的点球也无法帮助切尔西逆转。

sentences.english: A penalty kick may be an appropriate penalty for shoving and grabbing inside the box.
sentences.chinese: 对于禁区内的推搡和拉拽点球也许是个恰当的处罚。

definition: to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
(sports) to extend the duration of a game (due to stoppages)/(abbr. for 傷停補時|伤停补时[shang1 ting2 bu3 shi2]) injury time
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
hat trick (when one player scores three goals)
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
